mapper.select: select * from document d join srList s on srlCode = dCode join employees e on dWrite = eCode join product on srlMcode=pCode where dCate = #{dCate}
select * from document join srList on srlCode = dCode join employees on dWrite = eCode join product on srlMcode=pCode where dCate = 'srl' and (pName like '%${findStr}%' or eName like '%${findStr}%')
select * from product where pCate = #{pCate} order by pName ASC
mapper.insert: insert into document(dCode, dName, dCont, dDate, dWrite, dSign, dStatus, dCate) values((select max(dCode)+1 as dCode from Document),#{dName},#{dCont},#{dDate},#{dWrite},#{dSign},#{dStatus},#{dCate})
insert into srList(srlCode, srlMcode, srlEa, srlTerm, srlCate) values((select max(dCode)+1 as dCode from Document), #{CodeName}, #{pEa}, #{term}, 'srl')
mapper.select: select * from document where dCode=#{dCode} and dCate=#{dCate}
select * from SRLIST join PRODUCT on srlMcode=pCode where srlCode=#{dCode}
